instruction: What kinds of spectrum was used in the development of the hand-held fruit maturity meter that directly classifies the maturity state of mangoes?

instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance of the developed approach of the hand-held fruit maturity meter that directly classifies the maturity state of mangoes, and how accurate was it in predicting the maturity state of mangoes?
Output: The metric chosen to evaluate the performance of the developed approach was accuracy. The accuracy of the developed approach in predicting the maturity state (mature/immature) of mangoes was 88.2%.

instruction: What machine learning models were used to classify the maturity state of mangoes in the developed approach for the hand-held fruit maturity meter?

instruction: Can the developed DM mango maturity method, which achieved 88.2% accuracy in predicting the maturity state of mangoes, be considered superior to traditional methods of maturity estimation?
